abstract: New York Gov Andrew M. Cuomo, speaking at gala dinner for the state's largest gay rights group Empire State Pride Agenda, urges other states to follow New York's lead and allow gay couples to wed.
snippet: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, speaking to a gay rights group, called for legalization of same-sex marriage in every state.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships

lead_paragraph: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo, speaking to a gay rights group, called for legalization of same-sex marriage in every state.

headline.main: Cuomo Urges States to Allow Gay Marriage
headline.print_headline: Cuomo Urges States to Allow Gay Marriage
headline.seo: Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo Calls for Same-Sex Marriage in All States
